goal.en: The course is to provide the students about the fundamental knowledge of optogenetics and promote the students’ interests to major the related research subjects.
goal.ch: 建立光遺傳學基礎知識，以增進學生從事光遺傳學相關研究領域之興趣與能力。

content.en: “The interaction between the photon and biomolecules, molecular manipulation, regulation of biological behavior in live cells and animals, and application of optogenetics.“
content.ch: 光與生物分子作用、分子操控、活細胞與動物生理調控等最近光遺傳學研究與應用之探討。

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments
